description.en:
Kamikaze has hit the Japanese pro-wrestling world in a big crisis!!

"Ore and Kaneyan'' brought to you by the duo Ikki Kajiwara & Takeshi Kojo
A story of a passionate pro-wrestling boy. First book version!!

Synopsis

After Rikidozan's death, the Japanese professional wrestling world was in a big crisis with the World League match just around the corner.
Giant Baba, the athlete's president, follows Rikidozan's will and
searches for a kamikaze in the mountains of Hida that will blow away this crisis...
Can Daisuke Kamikaze, the boy secretly raised by Rikidozan, become the kamikaze that saves the world of Japanese professional wrestling?

Explanation

"Fukiyo! Kamikaze'', serialized in "Bokura'' in 1966, is a professional wrestling boys' manga originally written by Ikki Kajiwara.
He has also worked with Takeshi Kojo, who was in charge of the animation, on works such as "Ore to Kaneyan'' and "The Great King.''
This work "Blow! Kamikaze'' depicts a boy who devotes all of his youth to pro-wrestling for the Japanese pro-wrestling world. /span>Now is the time to deliver a professional wrestling manga that condenses the "promise" of Kajiwara's elements!!This time, we have reprinted the original manuscript of this work, which has been long awaited for 40 years since its serialization in "Bokura''. This work is reminiscent of Ikki Kajiwara's debut work "Champion Futa''.
